SEARCH
Package org.sgrewritten.stargate

Class Stargate

java.lang.Object
org.bukkit.plugin.PluginBase
org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin
org.sgrewritten.stargate.Stargate
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.bukkit.command.CommandExecutor, org.bukkit.command.TabCompleter, org.bukkit.command.TabExecutor, org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin, ConfigurationAPI, StargateAPI
public class Stargate extends org.bukkit.plugin.java.JavaPlugin implements StargateAPI, ConfigurationAPI
A plugin that allows for instant-teleportation between large distances and across servers. Highly customisable and designed with end-user portal creation in mind!

https://git.io/JuWkU | https://discord.gg/mTaHuK6BVa

Lead Developers:

Author:
Thorin (2020-Present), EpicKnarvik97 (2021-Present), PseudoKnight (2015-2020), Drakia (2011-2013), Dinnerbone (2010-2011)

    • addSynchronousTickAction

      public static void addSynchronousTickAction(SimpleAction action)
      Adds a 1-tick action

      The task is added to a queue which is processed every tick. Should be used in tasks that need to be finished within a short time frame

      Parameters:
      action -

      The action to add

    • addSynchronousSecAction

      public static void addSynchronousSecAction(SimpleAction action)
      Adds a 1-second action

      The task is added to a queue which is processed every second (20 ticks). Should be used in delayed actions

      Parameters:
      action -

      The action to add

    • addSynchronousSecAction

      public static void addSynchronousSecAction(SimpleAction action, boolean isBungee)
      Adds a 1-second action

      The task is added to a queue which is processed every second (20 ticks). Should be used in delayed actions

      Parameters:
      action -

      The action to add

      isBungee -

      Whether the action relies on the server name being known and should be put in the bungee queue

    • getMaxTextLength

      public static int getMaxTextLength()
      Gets the max text length which will fit on a sign

      The string length of a name consisting of only 'i'. This will fill a sign (including <>)

      Returns:

      The max text length which will fit on a sign
